title: Flatliners (1990) Julia Roberts+Kiefer Sutherland (Opt.MULTISUBS
description:
a.k.a. 
Flatliners
flatliners.
 <a href="
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0099582/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0099582/</a>

With Kevin Bacon and William Baldwin.

Optional subtitles in separate idx/sub files: (Work in Windows Media Player etc.): Czech, Danish, Dutch (srt format), English, Finnish, German, Greek, Hebrew, Hindi(!), Hungarian, Icelandic, Norwegian, Polish, Swedish, Turkish.

Classic film about medical students bringing themselves near death when their experiments begin to go awry. This film is often understood as a horror movie. However, Near Death experiences are actually surprisingly common, and this has constituted a serious research field for decades. But to play with it is of course strongly discouraged.

If you are interested, you will find a lot of more information at http://www.iands.org/ - The International Association for Near-Death Studies, and on related sites.

I could not find a 700 MiB rip with multisubs for this classic, so I made one for you by request.

Widescreen DVDrip XviD 2-pass 704x288, great stereo sound AC3.
Burn tested, runs well in both my standalone DivX players.
